name: A dice rolls into a bar...
name_original: A dice rolls into a bar...
description:
... and plays dead.

Create your own fully customizable die to complete complex and brain-twirling puzzles.

The upper side holds the active movement. When the side turns the movement is dictated by the side that is now upper.... You'll get it!

CONTROLS:

  • To move the cube, press or hold space after pressing begin 
  • Click on the sides to set directions

RESETTING SIDES DOES NOT RESET THE LEVEL.
